cx-error-server-connection: Error: Could not connect to the server.
cx-desc: A tool that allows editors to translate pages from one language to another with the help of machine translation and other translation tools
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y:
This page does not exist in $1 yet.
Do you want to create it?
cx-entrypoint-dialog-title-in: Title for the new page in $1:
cx-special-login-error: You must be logged in to translate in this page.
cx-tools-instructions-text2: You don't need to add them all
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Automatic translation is useful but you'll need to revise errors to make it accurate.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: When you are happy with the result, press "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
